README.html.title: Random | LinksPlatform's Platform.Random Library
README.html.keywords: Random LinksPlatform's Platform.Random Class Library. Namespace: Platform.Random Forked from: Konard/LinksPlatform/Platform/Platform.Helpers/Random NuGet package: Platform.Random Documentation PDF file with code for e-readers. Depend on Platform.Ranges Dependent libraries Platform.Data.Doublets Mystery files .travis.yml - Travis CI build configuration. docfx.json and toc.yml - DocFX build configuration. format-document.sh - script for formatting tex file for generating PDF from it. format-csharp-files.py - script for formatting .cs files as a part of tex file. generate-pdf.sh - script that generates PDF with code for e-readers. publish-docs.sh - script that publishes generated documentation and PDF with code for e-readers to gh-pages branch. push-nuget.bat - Windows script for publishing current version of NuGet package.
